headline: FirstEnergy notifies PSC of plan to apply for approval of gas-fired power plant project
summary: Dec. 22—dbeard @dominionpost.com MORGANTOWN — FirstEnergy sisters Mon Power and Potomac Edison on Monday filed notice with the Public Service Commission that they will be filing an application for a certificate of public convenience and necessity for their planned new combined cycle gas plant. The notice is only three sentences long and points out that the application will include related rate ...
